title: Frida Kahlo: Pain as Creative Fuel
description: A quick, practical guide to Frida Kahlo: Pain as Creative Fuel.

hook.text: A bus accident at 18 broke Frida Kahlo's spine, pelvis, and leg. Bedridden, she began to paint herself.
